docTitle.titlePart:
Maximum Frame Rate Video Acquisition Using Adaptive Compressed
Sensing

front.degree:
A thesis submitted to the Faculty of Graduate Studies and Research
in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of
Master of Science
in
Digital Signals and Image Processing

byline.affiliation: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

users of the thesis of these terms.
